entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
